qas.question: Who did the Gelug exchange gifts with?
Until what year frame did the Gelug exchange gifts with the the Ming?
What was the Gelug not mentioned in?

answers.text: the Mingshi or the Mingshi Lu

context: Even though the Gelug exchanged gifts with and sent missions to <a0_0>the Ming court<a0_0/> up until the <a1_0>1430s<a1_0/>, the Gelug was not mentioned in <a2_0>the Mingshi or the Mingshi Lu<a2_0/>. On this, historian Li Tieh-tseng says of Tsongkhapa's refusal of Ming invitations to visit the Yongle Emperor's court:
